Specifications

Field Type Flags Description
billing_address Embedded Nullable The billing address
contact Reference Nullable The contact linked to this revision
currency Embedded The currency used.
This is an embedded snapshot on which are based items conversions (if needed)
custom_payment_conditions String Nullable Blankable Custom payment conditions.
In some businesses custom payment conditions may be applied depending on the work or the delivery process.
In such cases, due_date acts as an expected due date used for budget projections
customer_reference String Nullable Blankable Some customers may request to figure a reference on the generated documents, linked to their tools.
This customer_reference is displayed between the document reference and the line items
delivery_address Embedded Nullable The delivery address
due_date Date Nullable Blankable Invoice due date.
Free value, must be greater than or equal to invoicing_date.
Warning A maximum duration may exist depending on your registration country
invoicing_date Date Nullable Blankable Invoice issue date
issue_date Datetime Readonly Revision's creation datetime
issuer Reference Readonly Nullable The Vosae user which has created this revision
line_items Related Nullable The items present in the revision
organization Reference Nullable The organization linked to this revision
pdf Dict Readonly Nullable A language-based dictionnary of previously generated PDFs of the document revision
revision String Readonly UID of the revision
sender String Nullable Blankable Name of the sender (person)
sender_address Embedded Nullable Address of the sender
sender_organization String Readonly Nullable Sender's organization
taxes_application String Taxes application.
One of:
  • EXCLUSIVE
  • NOT_APPLICABLE
